idea:
The dome house is constructed of fourth-generation building material

Special Expanded Polystyrene

Strength/Durability- Expanded polystyrene (styrene foam) is used widely as a cushioning material and is known for both its superior thermal insulation/cushioning properties and its extreme lightness of weight. Leveraging these characteristics, Japan Dome House has used special technology to successfully infuse the material with sufficient strength for use as a building/structural material. Moreover, multiple treatments, including a fire-retardant finish and UV protection coating, have been used to make it more durable than regular expanded polystyrene

Safety- Expanded polystyrene is comprised solely of hydrogen and carbon and is formed in a mold using steam, so no hazardous substances are used to make it, and no dioxins are generated when it is burned. No formaldehyde is used, either, so there is no risk of sick building syndrome or other building related illness. This safe, reliable material is human-friendly and contains no harmful substances.

Environmental Friendliness- Expanded polystyrene does not place a significant burden on the planet at any stage from manufacturing to use. It offers energy savings through excellent thermal insulation and airtightness, resource saving through the ability to only make the required amount with molding, and global warming prevention through a fluorocarbon-free manufacturing process. Offering environmental friendliness, itâ€™s a futuristic new material.
name: weltretter projects and consultants private limited

idea:
We are an education technology company which is established in 2021 as an Studyinfinity Pvt.Ltd. at Thane , Maharashtra. We provide complete educational software tool (Learning Management System) for offline classes to go online in budget. 
 
This app is developed by us in an easy-to-use online platform through which anyone with basic knowledge can take live interactive classes, share Pre-recorded lectures.

Our objective is to enable every educator, teachers coaching class, trainers to go online with right tools and best technology.
name: Studyinfinity private limited

idea: This startup is in the area of providing solutions to ultra-precision, high-range motion. The core technology is based on the patented compliant mechanism with IP developed at the Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay. The USP of technology and IP generated therein is compliant mechanism guided motion control platforms that can offer inexpensive, noise-free, backlash, and friction-free motion with no wear and tear and no lubrication giving long life without maintenance. Some of the numerous application areas include motion platforms for Micro-milling machines, scanning stage for microscope, micro 3D printers, optomechanical stages, laboratory stages for research into micro and nanoscale systems, ultraprecision scanning systems, robotic motion stages for precision surgeries, and so on.
name: FLEXMOTION TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
